thread.title: The country wakes up, the action begins: agricultural equipment and fences at a discount
thread.title_full: The country wakes up, the action begins: agricultural equipment and fences at a discount

author: @Vijestime
title: The country wakes up, the action begins: agricultural equipment and fences at a discount
text: While the unusually mild winter recedes, nature reminds us that the time for great activities is approaching. For all those preparing for agricultural work, the arrival of spring means more than just blooming. With the cold usually holding us back, now is the time to refresh the arsenal of tools and equipment! For decades, Okov sales centers have been the starting point of all agricultural work and traditionally bring discounts with which you can achieve significant savings. Below we highlight the best offers: - Petrol motor cultivator AL-KO – reliable [motor cultivator](https://www.okov.me/mn/basta-rad/motorni-bastenski-alati/kopacice)it will make it much easier to prepare the land for sowing or planting. Now you can get it at an exceptional price of only 559 euros, which makes you a significant saving! - A set of three garden shears - with good quality [garden shears](https://www.okov.me/mn/basta-rad/rucni-alati/makaze-bastenske)you will be ready to shape hedges, bushes and branches. During the promotion, you can buy them for only 17,90 euros. - Mesh for fences - secure your property with a quality wire fence, 25 meters long and 120 cm high, available at a price of only 35,90 euros. 4. Panel Fences – Give your property a modern look with [panel fences](https://www.okov.me/mn/basta-rad/ograde/paneli). Now you can get a 20% discount on panels and poles, making your investment even more profitable. Don't miss this unique opportunity to get ready for all agricultural work at affordable prices! Visit Oko's webshop and browse [complete offer](https://www.okov.me/mn/akcija/popust-poljoprivredna-oprema). As always, there is a lot of interest in the Okov promotions: so hurry and secure the products you want while stocks last. Download the Okov app To save even more, join the community of over 40.000 users of our application and apply for a digital Posto card. Special discounts are always valid for members of the Posto program!
